data.text: @F1Fanatic92 Get well soon mate, hope it doesn’t knockout you out for too long!
@F1Fanatic92 I had covid last year, main symptom I gave was no taste. Get well soon 🤙
@F1Fanatic92 On the posting, you can arrange for a collection, which costs 60p extra from the Royal Mail but it's worth it if you can't leave the house. 👍🏻💪🏻
@F1Fanatic92 Get well soon. eBay complaints coming your way! 🚑🚨
@F1Fanatic92 Had the same a month ago, wasn’t too poorly with the virus, but had stuff sold whilst I was isolating - luckily had friends could post for me. Hope for a speedy recovery for you.
@woodseatsmags Should be fine, amazed I managed to avoid it for as long as I have tbh, went out on Friday night so can only assume it's related to that
@F1Fanatic92 Ill keep you in my thoughts!!

@DudeoDan I'll be fine, just more annoying than anything as I just feel weak from the fever and have loads of flem/mucus on my chest so have coughed a lot.

Some sleep and rest for a couple of days and hopefully should be all good again. Ki
@F1Fanatic92 Hope it's not too bad for you
